name: evaluator
description: Evaluates the quality of a generated response based on the context.

inputs.name: short_term.response
inputs.description: The generated response to be evaluated.

outputs.name: mid_term.evaluation_score
outputs.description: The calculated quality score of the response (0.0 to 1.0).

outputs.name: long_term.optimization_log
outputs.description: A log entry detailing the evaluation, for future optimization.
